title: SQLCREATE DATABASE Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLCREATE DATABASE Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
CREATE DATABASE
The
CREATE DATABASE
command is used is to 
create a new SQL database.
The following SQL creates a database called "testDB":
Example
CREATE DATABASE testDB;
Tip:
Make sure you have admin privilege before creating any database. Once a 
database is created, you can check it in the list of databases with the 
following SQL command: SHOW DATABASES;

Reference

❯

+1
